Name: los_more_personal_information_helper
clcommon__Content__c:
Why is Identification Information necessary?
Identification Information is collected for performing Identity verification as part of the Loan Application process
What are Roles?
Please select "Beneficial Owner", if you own 25% or more in the Business
Please select "Authorized Signer", if you will be signing on behalf of the Business
Please select "Guarantor ", if you are personally guaranteeing the Loan
